cboCostEstimates.description: As Posted on the Website of the Clerk of the House on July 25, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: CBO’s Estimate of the Statutory Pay-As-You-Go Effects of H.R. 7132, the Safe Connections Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 48 (Thursday, March 17, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. KUSTER:
H.R. 7132.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the United States
Constitution, the Taxing and Spending Clause: ``The Congress
shall have Power To lay and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts
and Excises, to pay the Debts and provide for the common
Defense and general Welfare of the United States . . .''
[Page H3828]
title: Safe Connections Act of 2022
